content:
I'm looking at the UTG errors. The normative extension exists on a number of code systems. There's a definitional problem associated with that extension but that extension should not exist in UTG. So proposed fixes:

  • CodeSystem/data-absent-reason - remove this from UTG; it's normative in the FHIR space (special case)

    • same for CodeSystem/message-transport
    • also CodeSystem/restful-security-service

  • CodeSystem/definition-use - remove the normative marker in UTG, and correct that it is wrongly labelled in the next R4 technical correction

And make the same changes in the matching value sets
please let me know if you think those are the wrong things to do
@Ted Klein I'm leaving the v2 issues to you
Thanks I will examine and deal with these today.
Yes this is perfect now, there errors will be gone as soon as I do a PUSH. Thanks.
